name: nextipcelectron
description: A simple npm package boilerplate with TypeScript

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean-dist && npm run build
scripts.build:tests: tsc -b tests/tsconfig.json && node tests/copyStatic.js && npm run build:tests:preload
scripts.tests:e2e: npm run build && npm run build:tests && npx playwright test
scripts.runElectron: tsc -p src/tsconfig.json && npm run build:tests && electron dist-tests/e2e/electron/main.js

author: Rowan Van Zyl
